Comments: Assembly Position for Assault on Canal du Nord
0600 Ready to Cross the Canal, following 4th Bttn
1050 Achieved Objective at the Green Line
1430 Advanced to Railway embankment after area cleard by 2nd and 3rd Bttns
1230 Move to position SW of Haynecourt
1730 Relieved 8th Bttn after their advance during which they suffered heavy casualties
Regroup and prepare for Attack on Abancourt 01 Oct. Robert Connelly killed by Machine gun fire.
2130 Move to Assembly areas for Assualt on Abancourt
